translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Pairs of Doctrines in the Form of Questions
The Pairs of Doctrines with a Superior

original: Sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasauttaro🔽ca naanuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sauttaram dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anuttaram dhamma  paṭicca na sa uttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na sa uttaraḥ  ca na anuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With a superior state as condition, an inferior state arises through the relation of root-cause.

original: Sauttarañca anuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: sauttaram ca anuttarañca dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
